00015 #ifndef YA_UTILS_H
00016 #define YA_UTILS_H
00017 
00018 #include <stdlib.h>
00019 #include <stdint.h>
00020 #include <yyast/types.h>
00021 #include <yyast/config.h>
00022 
00023 typedef union {
00024     uint128_t   v;
00025     struct {
00026         uint64_t v[2];
00027     } in;
00028 } bswap128_t;
00029 
00030 inline uint128_t bswap128(uint128_t x)
00031 {
00032     bswap128_t  tmp128;
00033     uint64_t    tmp64;
00034 
00035     tmp128.v = x;
00036 
00037     tmp64          = __builtin_bswap64(tmp128.in.v[0]);
00038     tmp128.in.v[0] = __builtin_bswap64(tmp128.in.v[1]);
00039     tmp128.in.v[1] = tmp64;
00040 
00041     return tmp128.v;
00042 }
00043 
00046 inline uint128_t htonlll(uint128_t x)
00047 {
00048 #ifdef WORDS_BIGENDIAN
00049     return x;
00050 #else
00051     return bswap128(x);
00052 #endif
00053 }
00054 
00057 inline unsigned long long htonll(unsigned long long x)
00058 {
00059 #ifdef WORDS_BIGENDIAN
00060     return x;
00061 #else
00062     return __builtin_bswap64(x);
00063 #endif
00064 }
00065 
00066 inline 
00067 
00070 inline unsigned long long ntohll(unsigned long long x)
00071 {
00072 #ifdef WORDS_BIGENDIAN
00073     return x;
00074 #else
00075     return __builtin_bswap64(x);
00076 #endif
00077 }
00078 
00083 inline size_t ya_align64(size_t x)
00084 {
00085     if (sizeof (x) == 4) {
00086         return (x + 7) & 0xfffffff8;
00087     } else {
00088         return (x + 7) & 0xfffffffffffffff8;
00089     }
00090 }
